titles.title: 473 Prayer For The Spirit's Fruit (easy sweet tune

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
May the fruit
Of God the Spirit
Grow in me abundantly
Fruit that glorifies
My Father everlastingly

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
May the love of God
Flow through me
Like the life within the vine
Give me joy
That knows no measuure
Showing I am Thine

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
May Thy peace
Keep guard within me
Peace that passes
human thought
May I patient be
Long-suff'ring
Serving as I ought

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Make me gentle
In my contacts
Gentle as a summer breeze
May Thy goodness
Grow in plenty
As on fruitful trees

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
May my faith
In God my Father
Steadfast grow
In every way
Rooted deep in God's
Own promise
Fruitful every day

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Make me meek like
Christ my Savior
Meek when under
Stress and strain
Teach me Lord
In all things daily
Self-control to gain

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
May my life yield
God a harvest
Of the Spirit's fruit always
As a branch
Secure in Jesus
All my hours and days
